Header.title: The Monday Club
Header.paragraph: Alternative country rock band from Connemara

About.paragraph: The Monday Club is an alternative country rock band from Connemara bringing an exciting new sound to Ireland. Conor Yule, Sean Mercer, and Liam DeCourcey blend their individual styles to accompany one another and create feel good catchy songs.
